short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super Mario Run Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Super Mario Bros background. Custom Super Mario wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Super Mario wallpapers with every new tab.  
2. Select random Super Mario backgrounds or mark favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated search bar with results from your preferred search engine.  
4. Quick access to emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.  
6. "New Note" feature to jot down tasks easily.  
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.  
8. Simple access to your bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for quick navigation.  
10. Instant access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and switch to new themes effortlessly.  
12. Share content directly to social media platforms.  
13. One-click option to download wallpapers.  
14. Quick access to games.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Super Mario new tab.
